messages.subject: New web site additions
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to remind everyone to frequently check out the website http://www.shinsengumihq.com I try to add things as time permits and I don t always remember
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to remind everyone to frequently check out the website
http://www.shinsengumihq.com I try to add things as time permits and I
don't always remember to make note or it on the home page or send a list
reminder. We have some quizzes courtesy of Miss Behavin and I finally
got the first few pieces of art up courtesy of our intrepid
secretarytocapt3. Please let me know if they take too long to load I can
scale them down if if they do.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
